item.title: mq
item.description: A program that asks you maths questions, written in Perl 6, and licensed under the GNU GPL v3.0 Installation instructions for Linux: git clone https://github.com/Noisytoot/mq cd mq chmod +x mq.p6 ln -s $PWD/mq.p6 /usr/local/bin/mq # Replace /usr/local/bin/mq with where you want to install mq, you may need root permissions to run this mkdir ~/.mq GitHub GitLab
